Verses: 1 needhiyaich Sarikkattugira Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Needhiyaich Sarikkattugira Dhevane, Piragaasiyum.
2 boomiyin Niyaayaadhibadhiye, Neer Ezhundhu, Perumaikkaararukku Badhilaliyum.
3 karththaave, Dhunmaarkkar Edhuvaraikkum Magizhndhu, Dhunmaarkkar Edhuvaraikkum Kalikoorndhiruppaargal?
4 edhuvaraikkum Akkiramakkaarar Yaavarum Vaayaadi, Kadinamaaip Pesi, Perumaipaaraattuvaargal?
5 karththaave, Avargal Umadhu Janaththai Norukki, Umadhu Sudhandharaththai Odukkugiraargal.
6 vidhavaiyaiyum Paradhesiyaiyum Kondru, Thikkatra Pillaigalaik Kolaiseydhu:
7 karththar Paaraar, Yaakkobin Dhevan Gavaniyaar Endru Sollugiraargal.
8 janaththil Mirugagunamullavargale, Unarvadaiyungal; Moodare, Eppozhudhu Buththimaangalaaveergal?
9 kaadhai Undaakkinavar Kelaaro? Kannai Uruvaakkinavar Kaanaaro?
10 jaadhigalai Dhandikkiravar Kadindhukollaaro? Manushanukku Arivai Bodhikkiravar Ariyaaro?
11 manushanudaiya Yosanaigal Veenendru Karththar Arindhirukkiraar.
12 karththaave, Dhunmaarkkanukkuk Kuzhivettappadumvaraikkum, Neer Theengunaatkalil Amarndhirukkappanni,
13 sitchiththu, Ummudaiya Vedhaththaikkondu Bodhikkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
14 karththar Thammudaiya Janaththai Negizhavidaamalum, Thammudaiya Sudhandharaththaik Kaividaamalum Iruppaar.
15 niyaayam Needhiyinidamaagath Thirumbum; Semmaiyaana Irudhayaththaar Yaavarum Adhaip Pinbatruvaargal.
16 dhunmaarkkarukku Virodhamaai En Patchaththil Ezhumbugiravan Yaar? Akkiramakkaararukku Virodhamaai En Patchaththil Nirpavan Yaar?
17 karththar Enakkuth Thunaiyaayiraavittaal, En Aaththumaa Seekkiramaai Mavunaththil Vaasampanniyirukkum.
18 en Kaal Sarukkugiradhu Endru Naan Sollumbodhu, Karththaave, Umadhu Kirubai Ennaith Thaangugiradhu.
19 en Ullaththil Visaarangal Perugugaiyil, Ummudaiya Aarudhalgal En Aaththumaavaith Thetrugiradhu.
20 theemaiyaik Kattalaiyinaal Pirappikkira Kodungolaasanam Umakku Isaindhirukkumo?
21 avargal Needhimaanudaiya Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaaik Koottangoodi, Kutramillaadha Raththaththaik Kutrappaduththugiraargal.
22 karththaro Enakku Adaikkalamum, En Dhevan Naan Nambiyirukkira Kanmalaiyumaayirukkiraar.
23 avargaludaiya Akkiramaththai Avargalmel Thiruppi, Avargaludaiya Pollaappinimiththam Avargalaich Sangarippaar; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Sangarippaar.
